roleset.name: (have a) disease

example.name: diseased-j: arg 0 as disease
example.text: The liver is diseased with cirrhosis.

example.name: diseased-j: Arg 1 with 2 things should (and often are not) be tagged as ADV
example.text: Bilateral hypogastric arteries were diffusely diseased with areas of stenosis.

example.name: disease-n
example.text: ... to ensure there is no mucosal disease ...

roleset.note: DISEASE NOTES: Rolesets reconfigured for THYME-AMR. We created an .02 roleset and merged the old .01 roleset into it for naming reasons (rather than simply using the existing diseased-01)-- 'disease' is a much preferred name over 'diseased'. In this case, the roleset his high-frequency enough for such a change to be worthwhile.
DISEASED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharpe data. Slight comparison to infect.01. Infect.01 is a member of VN class fill-9.8. Framed by Katie. (from diseased.01-j)
